project.name: Knative
project.description: [Knative](https://knative.dev/) is an open source, Kubernetes-based platform for building, deploying, and managing serverless and event-driven applications. It helps development teams manage, monitor, and operate Kubernetes in a way that requires less technical knowledge and time.

applicant.name: Dave Protasowski
applicant.role: Technical Oversight Committee and Serving Working Group Lead
